detail_desc: Jacket in soft fleece designed to be worn as a thermal mid layer with a stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, and long raglan sleeves. Unlined. The jacket is made partly from recycled polyester.
Off-the-shoulder dress woven in a cotton blend with concealed elastication and a wide flounce at the top. Concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist and flared skirt. Unlined.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button, and super-skinny legs.
Long-sleeved jumper in a textured-knit cotton blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Biker jacket in woven fabric with a diagonal zip down the front and notch lapels with a press-stud. Long sleeves with elasticated ribbing underneath and zipped side pockets. Lined.
Pre-tied bow tie with an elastic strap and adjustable plastic fastener at the back. Width 10 cm.
Short dress in woven fabric with an opening and button at the back of the neck, short sleeves with double flounces and a detachable tie belt under the bust. Jersey lining.
Jumper knitted in supersoft chenille with long sleeves and narrow ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with a fold-down shaft and soft terry inside. Sizes 3-9 with anti-slip protectors.
Wrapover blouse in woven fabric with long, tapered puff sleeves. Deep V-neck, a concealed press-stud at one side and wide ties at the waist.
Shaping. 5-pocket jeans in washed denim with technical stretch that holds in and shapes the tummy, thighs and seat while keeping the jeans in shape. High waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs.
Straight-cut blouse in softly draping silk with a V-neck front and back, short cap sleeves and short slits in the sides.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with a high elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and elasticated hems. Soft brushed inside.
Hooded jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Block-coloured top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a text motif. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves, ribbing around the neckline and cuffs, and a drawstring at the hem.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist.
Sleeveless blouse in a softly draping weave with pin-tucks down the front. Small stand-up collar, concealed buttons at the front, a yoke with a pleat at the back, and a gently rounded hem. Unlined.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with a ribbed polo neck and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Lightweight, padded jacket in woven fabric with a detachable hood and zip down the front with a chin guard. Side pockets and narrow elastication around the hood and cuffs.
Short swim shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist. Soft mesh inner shorts.

Set with a top and pair of trousers in patterned jersey made from a soft viscose blend. Top with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Trousers with covered elastication at the waist, diagonal side pockets and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Trousers in woven fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, patch front pockets and a back pocket. Long legs with a tab and button.
High-waisted jersey leggings.

Padded jacket in woven fabric with a small stand-up collar and detachable, lined hood with a concealed hook and loop fastening. Zip down the front, deep side pockets and elasticated cuffs. Lined. Polyester filling.

Short dress in airy chiffon with a flounce-trimmed V-neck, sewn-in wrapover front, elasticated seam at the waist, elasticated, flounced cuffs and a flounced hem. Lined. The dress is made partly from recycled polyester.
Sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with flatlock seams, long raglan sleeves, twisted side seams and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a cotton blend.
Short-sleeved jersey top with a chest pocket and gently rounded hem. Longer at the back.

5-pocket, ankle-length trousers in washed cotton twill with a zip fly and button. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement over the thighs and knees to create a comfortable, straight silhouette.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Base layer tights in soft wool jersey with ribbing at the waist and hems. The tights are designed with the minimum number of seams for optimum comfort.
Trainers in imitation leather with a low shaft with a padded edge, lacing at the front and loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and TPR (thermoplastic rubber) soles.
Fancy dress costume in jersey with a skeleton print. Hook and loop fastening at the back, and a matching, printed hood with holes for the eyes and mouth.
Calf-length kaftan dress in soft cotton jersey with a V-neck, cap sleeves and slits in the sides. Unlined.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft knit with a round neckline and ribbed trims.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric. Slightly looser fit with dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Sleeveless dress in soft, patterned cotton jersey with elastication at the top and narrow shoulder straps with a decorative bow on the shoulders. Gathered seam at the waist and a flared skirt.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a contrasting colour waist panel.

Sleeveless nursing dress in chiffon with an opening and button at the back of the neck, decorative frill trims at the top and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Double layer at the front with deep armholes and a wrapover lining for easier nursing access. Lined.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and a gently rounded hem.
Jeggings in washed, superstretch denim with a high waist, fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with reversible sequins on the front (sizes 1½-3Y with normal sequins), and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs on one shoulder and at the crotch.
Blouse in spotted mesh with sequin appliqués and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Frilled yoke, short sleeves with frill trims and a flare to the hem. Partly lined.
Small shoulder bag in imitation leather with a narrow, adjustable shoulder strap and a zip at the top. Lined. Size 6x15.5x20.5 cm.
Sleeveless fancy dress costume in soft, fluffy fleece. Hood with embroidered details and appliqués, a fluffy padded tail at the back and ribbing at the hem.
Flared skirt in jersey with an elasticated waist, overlocked frill trim at the top and overlocked hem. Unlined.
Leggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist.

Padded parka in woven fabric with a sheen. Hood with a faux fur lining and adjustable tab with a metal fastener at the back, zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front, and a concealed drawstring at the waist. Diagonal handwarmer pockets, flap side pockets with a press-stud, inner ribbing at the cuffs, and an elasticated drawstring at the hem. Slightly longer at the back. Lined.
T-shirts in soft jersey. The cotton content of the T-shirts is organic.
Fitted dress in sturdy jersey with a V-neck, double-layered top and long sleeves.
Wide top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a slightly wider neckline, dropped shoulders, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs and a raw, cut-off hem.
Fully lined bikini top in soft velour with removable inserts and no fasteners.
Sweatpants with an elasticated drawstring waist, zipped side pockets, a fake back pocket, low crotch and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Leggings in soft, ribbed organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
T-shirt in soft cotton with a print motif and sequins.
Short, fitted skirt in a sturdy cotton weave with a high waist and buttons down the front. Unlined.
Warm-lined ankle boots in imitation suede with a zip at the back. Faux fur linings and insoles and fluted rubber soles. Heel 3 cm.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit cotton and wool blend with a round neckline and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Boots in crocodile-patterned imitation leather with pointed toes and covered heels. Satin linings made from recycled polyester and insoles in imitation leather. Heel 8 cm.
Short cardigan knitted in soft tape yarn with a V-neck, long sleeves and a wrapover front with ties at the hem.

Blouse in a textured cotton weave with embroidery on the front, a small, gathered stand-up collar and a V-shaped opening with twisted ties that have pompom-decorated tassels. Long raglan sleeves with seams and pleats, and narrow, covered elastication at the cuffs.
Soft fleece tights with an elasticated waist and space for a growing tummy.
Short dress in chiffon with a V-neck, seam with a small frill trim below the bust, and long sleeves with narrow elastication and a small frill at the cuffs. A-line cut to the hem. Jersey lining.
Short-sleeved jersey top in a soft modal blend with visible seams and an asymmetric hem.

Wedge-heeled sandals in suede with long straps at the top that tie around the ankles, jute heel caps and a braided jute trim around the soles. Imitation leather insoles. Platform front 2.5 cm. Heel 9 cm.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with an interactive motif and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Short, pleated skirt in woven fabric with a high waist and belt with a metal buckle. Unlined.
Bell-shaped skirt in a fine-knit viscose blend with an elasticated waist.
Skirt in soft rib knit with an elasticated waist and flare to the hem.
Hipster briefs in microfibre with lace trims, a low waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
Fully lined swimsuit with frills at the top, a deep V-neck front and back, and padded cups with removable inserts.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with embroidery, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and a fake welt back pocket.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist and ties at the sides.
Imitation leather jacket with quilted details, a ribbed stand-up collar and detachable hood in sweatshirt fabric. Zip down the front, a zipped chest pocket and zipped side pockets. Lined.

Long, sleeveless dress with a unique nursing feature, narrow shoulder straps and a gathered seam on the skirt for added width. The design includes a double layer at the top to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a frill trim at the front, low waist, narrow ties at the sides and high cut at the back.
